name: Henry J. CIANFRANI, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, STATE EMPLOYEES' RETIREMENT BOARD
name_abbreviation: Cianfrani v. Commonwealth, State Employees' Retirement Board

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
NIX, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Henry J. CIANFRANI, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, STATE EMPLOYEES’ RETIREMENT BOARD.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Order of the Commonwealth Court, 57 Pa.Cmwlth. 143, 426 A.2d 1260, entering judgment in favor of appellee State Employees’ Retirement Board and against appellant Henry J. Cianfrani is affirmed.
NIX, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Charles M. Golden, Sharlyn B. Cohen, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Susan J. Forney, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
460 A.2d 753
Henry J. CIANFRANI, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, STATE EMPLOYEES’ RETIREMENT BOARD.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 26, 1983.
Decided May 31, 1983.
Charles M. Golden, Sharlyn B. Cohen, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Susan J. Forney, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
